title: Emperor Spices’s Cardamom best kept secret – Emperor Spices Cardamom
description: You should never buy cardamom loose. That’s because the oil that holds all the aroma and flavour is volatile. And then the cardamom would be useless.But did you know, for centuries, that was exactly how cardamom was sold – wholesale in bags or sacks and then sold loose by weight to retail customers.
